actions.message: You're going to need to specify a **module** to see the commands of, like this: ``z!module basic`` or ``z!module zombs``. For a list of all modules please refer to ``z!help``.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: This is the basic module, the module that contains more of my simpler commands.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
``z!help`` - Shows the help message in chat.
``z!support`` - Sends a link to the Zombs Bot Lounge in chat.
``z!addme`` - Sends a link to add the bot to your own Discord!
``z!bal`` - Shows your Z-Gem balance.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: This is the Zombs module. It focuses on commands regarding ZR. Most commands will require you to link and verify ownership of your Zombs Royale account first. To do so, simply type ``z!link``.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
``z!profile [ZR tag]`` - Shows detailed information about that user.
``z!link`` - Initiates the ZR account verification process.
``z!unlink`` - Unlinks your ZR account from the bot (if it is linked).
``z!tag @user`` - Shows your tag, or the tag of other users (linked users only).
``z!launcher`` - Easily launch ZombsRoyale.io on browser/client.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: This is the asset module. This commands in this module are mostly for GFX designers or YouTubers looking for assets to use in their thumbnails! Download assets or request them, whichever you prefer.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
``z!asset [asset name]`` - Fetch any ZR cosmetic asset.
``z!gfxpack`` - Download a .ZIP file of all the game's assets.
``z!sfxpack`` - Download a .ZIP file of all the game's sounds.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Ready to play? Then this is the module for you. You can make Zombs Royale cosmetic combos using items from your inventory. Feel like spending your Z-Gems on some fancy **chests?** You can buy chests and open them here, too.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
``z!shop`` - Opens the Zombs Bot shop. *(coming soon)*
``z!locker`` - Opens your locker/inventory.
``z!combo`` - Make a combo **(using items from your locker).**
``z!seasoncd`` - Shows a countdown till the next ZR season.

``z!hourly`` - Get your hourly reward of 15-30 Z-Gems!
``z!slots (amount)`` - Bet your Z-Gems on a slot machine!
``z!guess`` - Guess the name of a random cosmetic to win!
``z!gift`` - Claim a special Zombs Bot gift to your locker *(event)*
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: The utility module is for utility-based commands like checking my ping, memory, CPU usage and other things.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
``z!ping`` - Replies with my ping (ms).
``z!engine`` - Replies with detailed info about my status.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Beep, boop! I have many **modules** for you to use, so here's a comprehensive list of all of them! I hope you have fun!
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
${tempVars("zgem")} Z-Gems are a my special bot currency. You can earn them in different ways and can spend them on cool perks like boosters and other neat things.

Check how many you have with ``z!balance`` or ``z!bal``!
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Do ``z!module basic`` to view the commands in this module.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Do ``z!module zombs`` to view the commands in this module.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Do ``z!module asset`` to view the commands in this module.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Do ``z!module interactive`` to view the commands in this module.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message: Do ``z!module utility`` to view the commands in this module.
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
${member}, ready to begin the linking process?

Once your account is linked to Zombs Bot, you'll unlock many more of the features my Zombs Module has to offer.

Ready to start? First, *please type your full Zombs Royale username and tag.*
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Alright! Your tag has been entered as ``${tempVars("tag")}``. 
Is this correct? Please type "yes" or "no".
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
${member}- Thank you for submitting your tag. The last step to verify your account is to send a friend request from your Zombs Royale account to **Link#7764**. Once you have sent the friend request, please react with "‚≠ê" to complete your account link submission.
Visual Guide: https://gyazo.com/289d2f7f11f1f3a48325edb56b3824bf
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: A user is requesting verification! <@${tempVars("memid")}> is trying to link their account using the tag ``${tempVars("tag")}``. Please verify it!
actions.name: Send Message To Webhook
Find Custom Emoji in Specified Server

actions.message: ${member}, thank you for linking your Zombs Royale account to my Zombs module! We are now verifying your request and you will receive a DM once it has been approved by a bot developer. üëç
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${member}, cancelled linking process. Ready to try again? Just do ``z!link``.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${member}, your account is already linked! If you want to link a different account, please unlink your current one using ``z!unlink``.
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
${member}, are you **sure** you want to unlink your ZR account?
All information stored about you within the Zombs Module will be erased, such as your player card and your player tag.
You can re-link your account at any time using ``z!link``.

If you are sure you want to do this, please type "unlink".
If you do not want to do this, please type "cancel".
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${member}, you have successfully unlinked your ZR account. üò¶
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: ${member}, I have cancelled the operation. ‚ö†Ô∏è
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: To buy chests, use ``z!buy [basic, medium, special]``. Make sure you have enough to afford them though!
